        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Vizualizing and modeling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vizualizing und Formung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vizualizing et modeler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vizualizing e modelar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vizualizing e modellare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Vizualizing και διαμόρφωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vizualizing y el modelar</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article discusses the tools used to investigate and the findings around the topic of Vizualisation and modelling.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vizualization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">modeling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">simulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">design principles</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel behandelt die Hilfsmittel, die 
benutzt werden, um und die Entdeckungen um das Thema von Vizualisation
und von Formung nachzuforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet article discute les outils utilisés pour 
étudier et les résultats autour du sujet de Vizualisation et de 
modeler.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo discute as ferramentas usadas 
investigar e os findings em torno do tópico de Vizualisation e de 
modelar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo discute gli strumenti utilizzati 
per studiare ed i risultati intorno al soggetto di Vizualisation e di 
modellistica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο συζητά τα εργαλεία που χρησιμοποιούνται
για να ερευνήσουν και τα συμπεράσματα γύρω από το θέμα 
Vizualisation και της διαμόρφωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este artículo discute las herramientas usadas 
para investigar y los resultados alrededor del asunto de Vizualisation
y de modelar.</string>
          </description>
